items.sentence: While Tom was still talking, Mary entered through the door.
If you come with me, I'm sure that you'll have a good time.
Study for tomorrow's exam first before doing anything else.
Because of the bad weather, we've decided not to go hiking.
Tom started talking in French, which I couldn't understand.
What you're thinking about moving doesn't need to be moved.
Tom fell asleep while Mary was telling him a bedtime story.
Tom was playing with his brothers and sisters at that time.
Tom hasn't yet finished reading the book that you lent him.
You say you aren't angry, but you sure do act like you are.
